title: BANNED FOR PLAYING THE GAME HOW IT SHOULD BE PLAYED?
body: Clearing I was banning for cursing my team mates.....which is rare for me. I got stuck with teemo support (Guy intentionally came in the game trying to troll) I gave him a chance thinking it wasn't going to be bad. He then watched me die. <Keep this in mind. I will repeat later because I know you league of legends players like to change subject alot. He watched me die. He was trolling. We were both in lane and he watched me die. He was trolling. Then I proceeded to tell the enemy ADC that my support is trolling. Do you know what the enemy adc responds with? "You're just bad". I started to rage. This troll teemo turned my entire team against me. And then I was perma banned for it? Should I start doing this? Should I just troll all my life on league making people waste their time but make sure I don't type at all? Because there's no trolling option for reporting someone. I think I will do that...

replies.body:
You weren't banned for a troll teemo.

3 games were given in your reform card. In addition to this, you have had 2x 10-game chat restrictions, a 25-game chat restriction and a 14-day ban before this ban. They were all in a short period of time. Many things were considered in your penalty, and you were given many chances.

Teemo was not trolling you. You threatened to afk at 11 minutes.

Hmm let me see...

You raged at your teammate and the enemy team and then went AFK after two deaths.

Yep, bannable.  Plus you've probably gotten chat restricted and temp banned before, or you just went full ham in your attack in which case you deserve your ban even more.
I didn't go afk. Simply because I said im afking doesn't mean I really afked. Just like I can say i have a trillion dollars. Oh wait, I actually do because i TYPED it on the internet.

You went 0/2/0 with 89 cs and were three levels below your next lowest leveled teammate (who, notably, went 1/8/1, so they were dead a lot more than you), I'm pretty damn sure you went AFK bub.

Deny it all you want, the statistics say otherwise.

The statistics? U wanna talk statistics with me? http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=HolpLess

now link me yours if you aren't scared.

You linked exactly what I was referring to.  Your Tristana game, 0/2/0 and three levels behind the nearest ally, despite that ally spending much more time dead.  Thank you for making my point easier to make, I guess.

Give me an alternative explanation for your low numbers across the board that game if you really didn't AFK.
lmfao...did you even read my first post...my teemo trolled. That's the reason for my statline....cmon man

no your level 8 and the trolling teemo is 12, you spend the last 8 minutes and didn't get a single cs..... You raged on your team and the enemy team then went AFK. You can try to lie but its pretty obviously, also the teemo has a much better score than you and didn't take your cs. From what I can tell you BOTH died(he didn't just watch he died too, also before you did) and then you went back into lane and died not even 2 minutes later. After that, you went AFK and lost your team the game. I'm not saying he wasn't a troll, but you did rage and then went AFK which is why you got banned and deserved to get banned

"Keep this in mind. I will repeat later because I know you league of legends players like to change subject alot"
Thanks for giving us credit, man I really sympathi.... Yasuo has too much mobility...... Yeah no, you've lost whatever sympathy I might have had. Now it's time to dissect your little post.

"He was trolling" "He was trolling" again... Yeah we get it, you think he's trolling. Then you proceed to ask the _enemy_ (not exactly your friend) if he is indeed seeing what you are seeing. He offers no sympathy as he's just got a free lane and possibly a free win, yet you proceed to flip your lid. That was mistake number 1 and 2 in all honesty.

"This troll teemo turned my entire team against me. And then I was perma banned for it?" You also didn't get perma-banned from one offence unless you went all out. I expect nothing but suicide challenges and racial slurs out the butt no doubt right? Hahaha no... You knew very well that your ban was coming yet you refused to change how you compose yourself in games. Sounds like you deserved it man, not to be rude but yea, I can't put it any nicer way. (More or less mistakes 3-5 here)

But hey, let's just take a look at the whole picture here cause why not. You're likely where you're supposed to be ranked wise coming in at a 49% winrate over 400ish games, so getting crazy upset about one loss is really childish and unnecessary. You are still in the silver elo range so trolls/unskilled players are all over the place, but getting incredibly upset at them is pretty much the worst thing you can do. This is, if you want to win... or climb. 

So it sounds like you got two or possibly three options here. Hope to god that riot will accept a ban repeal and either clean your act up and start fresh so to speak. You could also go make a new account and try again, if you show some more respect to others not only will you climb easier, but you also won't get so messed up if you lose a game to a troll or a feeder. Or finally you could just leave league. You could move on to COD, WOW, Smite, Dota, etc, etc. But keep one thing in mind. Outside of COD they have much more serious punishments and much less tolerant banning systems. 

Whatever you decide to do is up to you, but I do wish you the best. It's obvious you have some little demons to work out, but once you do everything will be easier and more enjoyable. Good luck mate.
I have never and will never tell anyone to kill themselves or using any racial slur. I get banned for being slightly negative. That's it.
If it's only "slightly" negative, then reform should be extremely easy. I expect you to never be toxic in any other game ever.
